review: Dr Sumana garu has vast experience on gyno related and she could able to diagnose the problem very quickly for my spouse and provided the treatment.we could see the improvement on the same now.So far We are very much  happy with treatment.
Doctor has not stated the correct resaon for the infection. She said that it happens like that sometimes without giving any root cause for the problem.
reply_text:
Vaginal infection appears when ever there is lack of hygeine , excess moisture over the Pvt part , low immunity levels , wearing tight fitting clothes for longer hours , high blood sugar levels increaes the occurence of vaginal infection . 
I think I have given a explanation to ur women ,but not u 
Thankyou
